author: SaraW.LGN
post_text: October 13, 2020 at 10:23 AM#1Hi,Having a bit of trouble getting this syntax right. I'm creating a setvar to call pool objects that beigns with a certain name. So far as I understand you cannot have quotation marks within quotations when setting variables, i.e :setvar $myvar = "effect 1."$whatevereffects".1"This syntax doesn't return an error, but the syntax will cut off before my named pool object. I've tried to $"whatevereffects" in the syntax but it returns as the same result. Anyone knows the proper syntax for this or if there is a workaround? Any help is much appreciated!
title: setvar using Object Name
